entry.summary: ...Cold Wave Expected To Continue Through The Weekend... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 4:11PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: After a bitterly cold Thursday, the region will be subject to increasing bouts of wintry precipitation through the holiday weekend. On Friday, mainly snow is expected over the region. entry.summary: ...Risk for River Ice Jams Increasing Next Few Days... entry.summary: .A strong storm system will bring a warm up with heavy rains and strong winds Friday and Friday night. Widespread flooding is possible given the combination of rainfall and snowmelt. entry.summary: .A strong storm system will bring a warm up with heavy rains and strong winds Friday and Friday night. Widespread flooding is possible given the combination of rainfall and snowmelt.
